contest-event.event-date:
May 30, 1885 D Alloa Contest
Alloa Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Alloa Contest alloa-contest
Alloa Park, Alloa, Clackmannanshire, Scotland, UK Source: The Dundee Courier & Argus and Northern Warder (Dundee, Scotland), Tuesday, June 02, 1885; pg. 7; Issue 9949. 12 bands entered, 8 bands played. Hampson's book calls this "Championships of Great Britain" - the original report describes it as "open to the United Kingdom".
Prizes: 1: £40, 2: £30, 3: £14, [4: £6? 4th prize is not given in the original report where one would expect to see it, but the total prize fund of £95 would be completed by this amount] Quickstep contest: 1 Besses, £2 2 Oldham, £1.10.0 3 Linthwaite, £1 4 Honley, 10s
Dec. 29, 2011, 4:58 p.m. Aug. 29, 2016, 8:33 a.m.
1 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
2 Oldham Rifles Band Alexander Owen Rossini [arr. Round]
3 Honley Silver Band Edwin Swift Weber's Works
4 Linthwaite Silver Band John Gladney Jnr Weber's Works
Unknown Result Alloa Colliery John McBeath Honoria
Unknown Result Kirkcaldy Trades H. Cornel Iolanthe (selection)
Unknown Result Portobello Town J. Lilly La Sonnambula [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Tillicoultry James Jenkins Meyerbeer [arr. Round]
